title: Being Low as Dirt, Taking What’s Important From Me - Novel Updates
tags: Angels   Based on a Song   Senpai-Kouhai Relationship   Tsundere
author: Mano Mao   Pusu
description:
“To protect the girl fated to die an untimely death” 

That was the mission given to me by my senpai in heaven.

What were they thinking? Making me come down to earth to protect a foolish human…!

Even worse, an ordinary girl…?

Why should we, graceful angels, do such a thing!? 

I’m certain my senpai has always believed the same, or at least that’s what I thought, so why is it that…>
